snippet.title: Pick Axe Pete! -Odyssey 2 - Best Platform Video Games of All Time
snippet.description:
Pick Axe Pete! - Odyssey 2. The original Minecraft! One of the best games for the Odyssey 2 game console, and one of the best platform video games of all time from the classic era of video games. Made by game designer Ed Averett, and released in 1982 by N.A.P.

Dig for nuggets of Odyssey² History, at The Dot Eaters:
http://thedoteaters.com/?bitstory=odyssey²

http://www.thedoteaters.com  Video Game History 101

-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
View the goofy glitch that makes playing Access Software's classic game Leader Board Golf so much fun: 
https://youtu.be/HnEN942x5rY
-~-~~-~~~-~~-~-
